title: Fortnite
short_plot_summary: Players drop onto an island, build structures, gather resources, and battle each other to be the last person or team standing.
explanation: A running person, representing the action-packed gameplay of Fortnite
A hammer and wrench, symbolizing the building and crafting aspect of the game
A tornado, representing the storm that shrinks the playable area, forcing players closer together
A package, illustrating the supply drops and loot that can be found throughout the map
A pistol, signifying the combat and battle theme of the game
